  • SEARCH: 
 

Uses of Package
io.j4c.config

  • Packages that use io.j4c.config 
    Package Description
    io.j4c.common.configurable
    General utilities that use Config.
    io.j4c.common.pki
    Utilities for PKI configuration and loading of certificates and keys.
    io.j4c.config
    Immutable tree-like Configuration API that can be enhanced by custom SPI implementations.
    io.j4c.config.etcd
    Etcd configuration source.
    io.j4c.config.git
    Git configuration source.
    io.j4c.config.spi
    Configuration SPI that allows to enhance Config functionality.
    io.j4c.microprofile.config
    CDI extension for J4C implementation of microprofile config.
    io.j4c.microprofile.server
    Microprofile 1.0 server implementation.
    io.j4c.microprofile.server.spi
    SPI to extends microprofile server.
    io.j4c.security
    Supports security for web (and possibly other) resources including: Authentication: authenticate a request Authorization: authorize a request to a resource, possibly using ABAC or RBAC. Outbound security: propagating security on outbound calls. And security for any resource type when using programmatic approach.
    io.j4c.security.abac
    Attribute based access control (ABAC) security provider.
    io.j4c.security.abac.policy
    Attribute based access control policy validator.
    io.j4c.security.abac.policy.el
    Integration with Java EE expression language.
    io.j4c.security.abac.policy.spi
    Service provider interface (SPI) to support policy statements in Attribute based access control.
    io.j4c.security.abac.role
    Role attribute validator.
    io.j4c.security.abac.scope
    Scope (OAuth2) attribute validator.
    io.j4c.security.abac.spi
    Attribute based access control (ABAC) security provider's SPI.
    io.j4c.security.abac.time
    Time attribute validator.
    io.j4c.security.google
    Integration with Google login button.
    io.j4c.security.jersey
    Jersey integration for security module.
    io.j4c.security.provider.header
    Provider that can extract username from a (any) header.
    io.j4c.security.provider.httpauth
    Basic security provider, supporting "basic" and "digest" authentication schemes with role support.
    io.j4c.security.provider.httpsign
    Provider supporting validation of incoming signatures and signing of outbound requests.
    io.j4c.security.provider.jwt
    Provider that can process incoming JWTs and assert users based on them and can propagate JWTs (or create new ones) for outbound calls.
    io.j4c.security.providers
    Common classes for provider implementation.
    io.j4c.security.spi
    Security component's SPI.
    io.j4c.security.tools.config
    Support for encrypted properties.
    io.j4c.security.util
    General utilities for security modules.
    io.j4c.security.webserver
    Integration library for RxServer.
    io.j4c.webserver
    Reactive web server API.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config used by io.j4c.common.configurable 
    Class Description
    Config
    Immutable tree-like Configuration API that can be enhanced by custom SPI implementations.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config used by io.j4c.common.pki 
    Class Description
    Config
    Immutable tree-like Configuration API that can be enhanced by custom SPI implementations.
  • Classes in io.j4c.config used by io.j4c.config 
    Class Description
    Config
    Immutable tree-like Configuration API that can be enhanced by custom SPI implementations.
    Config.Builder
    Config Builder.
    Config.Context
    Context associated with specific Config node that allows to access the last loaded instance of the node or to request reloading of whole configuration.
    Config.Key
    Object represents fully-qualified key of config node.
    Config.Type
    Configuration node types.
    ConfigException
    Exception is thrown by Config implementations.
    ConfigFilters.ValueResolvingBuilder
    A builder for value reference resolving filter.
    ConfigMapper
    Contextual mapper of a configuration hierarchy to a Java type.
    ConfigMappingException
    Configuration value mapping exception.
    ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder
    Composite ConfigSource Builder.
    ConfigSources.MapBuilder
    Map ConfigSource Builder.
    ConfigSources.MergingStrategy
    Merging strategy allows a user to implement merging of list of root nodes loaded by appropriate config sources into single ConfigNode.ObjectNode used by ConfigSources.CompositeBuilder.
    MissingValueException
    Exception representing a specific failures related to a missing configuration value.
    PollingStrategies.FilesystemWatchBuilder
    A builder for a filesystem watch polling strategy.
    PollingStrategies.ScheduledBuilder
    A builder for a scheduled polling strategy.
    RetryPolicies.Builder
    A builder of the default RetryPolicy.
